amendment.description: To make a technical correction to title III of division C.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2925 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2925 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Boozman to Amendment SA 2910. (consideration: CR S4333; text: CR S4335) To make a technical correction to title III of division C.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2925 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2925 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Boozman to Amendment SA 2910.
